basics.name: Yixiao Liu
basics.label: Robotics & Control
basics.summary: Senior student focused on optimal control (LQR/MPC), and simulation-based methods for motion planning. Interested in learning-based physics simulation and neural representations for robotics.

projects.name: Optimal Control for Nonlinear Systems
projects.description: Implemented LQR and MPC for nonlinear dynamical systems; built a trajectory-optimization pipeline and evaluated controller performance in simulation; generated quantitative visualizations of state and control profiles.
highlights: Designed modular Python code for fast experimentation
Compared MPC horizons and cost weightings across tasks

projects.name: UR16e Manipulator Simulation
projects.description: Modeled a 6-DOF UR16e arm (modified DH), derived dynamics for torque-based control and motion planning, and validated controllers in MATLAB/Simulink.
highlights: Benchmarked trajectory planners and tracking accuracy
